title: National Sample Survey (NSS)
description: Large-scale household surveys covering consumption, employment, health, education and more across India.

title: Annual Survey of Industries (ASI)
description: Primary source of industrial statistics in India providing data on number of factories, employment, wages, output, input, depreciation, fixed assets, inventories, etc.

title: Index of Industrial Production (IIP)
description: Monthly indicator that reflects the changes in the volume of production of a basket of industrial products.

title: Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Measures changes over time in the general level of prices of goods and services that households acquire for the purpose of consumption.

title: Wholesale Price Index (WPI)
description: Represents the price changes in the wholesale market for a basket of goods.

title: Economic Census
description: Enumeration of all entrepreneurial units in the country involved in any economic activity of either production or distribution of goods and services.
